item.title: Definition of Personal God

item.title: Wampeter
item.description: From Kurt Vonnegut’s Cat’s Cradle, a Wampeter is something that is currently serving as the vector or focus for your existence. This is a term created by Vonnegut so the interpretation of it certainly has some wiggle room.

item.title: What the Earthrise picture actually looked like
item.description: The “Earthrise” picture we’ve all seen has been altered for the sake of what humans expect to see when a heavenly body appears over a horizon. Daily, for the entire time the human race has existed, we see the sun and the moon rise from earth’s horizon and fall behind it.

item.title: Zond 5
item.description: The first earthlings that have the distinction to travel to the moon were not humans, rather a collection of tortoises, single-celled green algae, bacterial and assorted plants and fruit. Launched in September, 1968, the Russian Zond 5 was the first spacecraft to travel to the moon, loop behind (it didn’t orbit) and then return safely to the earth.
